text: John Forester (October 7, 1929 â€“ April 14, 2020) was an American industrial engineer. He was known for his works in bicycle transportation engineering. He was a known cycling activist and as "the father of vehicular cycling", for creating the Effective Cycling program of bicycle training. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Engineers from California Category:American activists Category:Writers from London Category:Writers from San Diego Category:American industrial engineers
